Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the SH-SY5Y cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression was significantly reduced for the variant NM_004763.5:c.984C>T in the presence of AÎ²42 peptide.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each sample.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in duplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: One-way ANOVA with post-hoc Tukey's test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than or equal to 80%.
